chunk:
Vichy Laboratories Liftactiv Hyalu Mask

Brand: Vichy

Category: Mask

Ingredients: : AQUA, GLYCERIN, ALCOHOL DENAT., DIMETHICONE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, CYCLODEXTRIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, ADENOSINE, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, LAURETH-7, CITRIC ACID, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PISUM SATIVUM EXTRACT,

DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, AMMONIUM POLYACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, LAURETH-7, CITRIC ACID, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, TETRASODIUM GLUTAMATE DIACETATE, PISUM SATIVUM EXTRACT, FAEX EXTRACT, POLYACRYLAMIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.

Directions: Application
Apply a thin, even layer of the hyaluronic acid face mask on clean, dry skin. Wait for 5 minutes and remove the excess with a damp cotton pad. Do not rinse with water. Avoid eye and lip contours.

Recommended to use three times a week and to use in place of your full anti-aging skincare regimen as an occasional treatment.

Recommended to use three times a week and to use in place of your full anti-aging skincare regimen as an occasional treatment.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
